short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-click highlighted text to turn it into CLAP 👏 EMPHASIZED 👏 TEXT!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This adds a little attitude to text upon a quick highlight & right click, like so:

"this 👏 adds 👏 a 👏 little 👏 attitude 👏 to 👏 text 👏 upon 👏 a 👏 quick 👏 highlight 👏 & 👏 right 👏 click, 👏 like 👏 so:"



Source code is available at https://github.com/atlc/emphasize-extension
